name: Hijab Make Up Salon
description:
Be creative and be inspired with hijab girl.
This game is a great choice for anyone who interested in make up and dress up for hijabs, and this game can even be used as a reference for you to apply real make up.

Features

- there are 3 playing modes: makeover,makeup,dressup.
- makeup on your face Create exciting  gorgeous look.
- Huge selection of colors for eye contact lenses, lipstick, eyeshadow,blushes and more.
- dressing up for girls with lots of clothes and accessories at your choice.
